messages.subject: Yamakawa siblings....possible inspiration for the Moeyoken contest, anyone?
messages.msgSnippet: http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/hiesan.jpg The Yamakawa siblings, left to right: Kenjirou, Misao, Tokiwa, Sutematsu, Miwa, Futaba, and Ookura (aka
messages.messageBody:
http://zikuubokujou.vivian.jp/hiesan.jpg

The Yamakawa siblings, left to right:

Kenjirou, Misao, Tokiwa, Sutematsu, Miwa, Futaba, and Ookura (aka
Taizou/Hiroshi).

Contemporary high school setting, it looks like. Any thoughts?

--M.

messages.subject: Samurai Fiction Contest
messages.msgSnippet: I came across an announcement for this contest on the Ninja Dojo film board and thought I d pass it on. There s a small entry fee $6 I think BUT the Winner
messages.messageBody:
I came across an announcement for this contest on the Ninja Dojo film
board and thought I'd pass it on. There's a small entry fee $6 I think
BUT the "Winner" gets to keep all the fees collected as their prize!

I never win writing contests but I thought there may be braver souls
amongst all of you.
www.samurai-archives.com/writcon.html
<http://www.samurai-archives.com/writcon.html>

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
The Blog-- http://www.livejournal.com/users/b_sheridan/



--
